thread.section_title: B2C Jewels Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B2C Jewels | www.b2cjewels.com
thread.title: Laurie Ratajczak-Schmitt
thread.title_full: B2C Jewels reviewed by Laurie Ratajczak-Schmitt

author: Laurie Ratajczak-Schmitt
title: Laurie Ratajczak-Schmitt
text: I was hesitant on ordering something so expensive online. Nick at B2C Jewels made me feel more confident as I had to call a few times with questions and he answered every one of them. I ordered a VS1 1.41 carat diamond and it suits my ring gorgeously! I would definitely order from B2C again before buying from a jeweler. Thank you again for helping make my ring a one of a kind!!
